name: EVOC Handlebar Pack Boa
description: More storage right on your bars. This double-ended roll top bag is water-resistant and expandable. The Boa® attachment system is super secure, compatible with flat or drop bars.140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating is durable and weather-resistant.Roll-top design gives you adjustable volume and access from both ends.Boa® Fit System attaches to gravel, MTB or road bike handlebars.
